title: weight loss
content: In one glass of milk add ginger juice and drink in empty stomach everyday

title: reduce hip fat
content: Take pineapple and mix with basil juice and drink for 7days

content: Add white pumpkin in your diet regularly to get a slim fit

content: Eat red banana mixed with honey or country sugar to gain weight faster
